MAN.TITLE: translatepaths
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: convert a set of Matlab M-files directories to Scilab

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a character string vector which gives the paths of Matlab M-file directories to convert
: a character string which gives the path of the directory where the Scilab functions are written to. Default value is current directory.

DESCRIPTION.P: translatepaths, converts all Matlab M-file contained in a set of directories to Scilab functions. Each function is converted by mfile2sci.
Trace of conversion information is stored in a file named "log" in the res_path directory
When called without rhs, translatepaths() launches a GUI to help to select a file/directory and options.
